chat.donkin-title: The most professional AI investment consultant in the cryptocurrency circle
chat.donkin-subtitle: Hello! I am Donkin. You can check the real-time information of the cryptocurrency circle at any time. Please tell me what you are interested in!
chat.donkin-warning: Donkin may provide inaccurate information, please verify important information

default-prompt.title: Example：
default-prompt.latest-coins: What are the most popular tokens recently
default-prompt.smart-wallet-recommendations: What are smart money addresses buying
default-prompt.largest-whales: What are whale addresses buying recently
default-prompt.info-about: I want to know the information of {item} token
